resources.string: Makeup_Seach App is designed in December, 2021. This App helps you find your favourite makeup products easily. Also, you can save products to your favourites...Select a brand from main page, it will show you the list of all makeup product categories from that brand. Select a product type to see all the products of that type. Click on the product to save it to your favourites. To see the favourites, click menu on main page and select Favourites
